attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP 🤢🤢🤢
attributes.review: This app kept having ads pop up and I ha ran app downloaded that blocks ads so why is there ads on here, also the menus kept glitching and I really don’t find that professional, also this app wouldn’t show up on my home screen it was blank. So please DO NOT GET THIS APP!!! It’s for that better.

attributes.title: This app is horrible 🧚🏻‍♂️
attributes.review: First I opened this app just to see the president. However, it gliched in front of my face. This app constantly crashes. So then i brought my granny to see to president however she fainted. Since he reminded her of Freddy Krueger. First the app crashes then it cause my grandmother to faint. I will not stand for this 🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬.

attributes.title: ✨worst app ever✨
attributes.review: you know i support our cheeto of a president as much as the next person (not at all) but i have to say this app could be really damaging to anyone that downloads it. it continues to display harmful propaganda yesterday it even told me the only way i could get bunker boy to love me was of i set my house on fire. maybe that explains why so many of his supporters live in trailers. this should honestly be taken of the app store we wouldn’t want our impressionable youth and mindless conservatives believing this was a reasonable way of thinking. yeah❤️

attributes.title: Caused my phone to shut off
attributes.review: When I tried to enter my information in it kept shutting off even when I restarted my phone! Review this awful app or delete it because I don’t know if others are having the same issue.

attributes.title: Glitches
attributes.review: When I first downloaded the app and seemed like it was working fine and great information for support, but after that it started to glitch and I can’t use it in one I just am frustrated because now I can’t get the information I need

attributes.title: OMG Don’t download
attributes.review: The first thing I saw was so bad and it’s not right to look at. Just don’t download you going to cry and start hating the color orange and If you want to be safe please ✨don’t download it be really bad and do you know this orange person just like to make fun of people which is not right. attributes.title: I hate the app
attributes.review: You know what else I hate the pedo we have for a president✨anyway the app is slow and I can even open it anymore😡 what is the point of this if I can’t even open it huh 😯plus I have to see that racist orange face when I open it like why would I want that👺🟠.

attributes.title: I got a virus
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because our president Donald Jenius Trump is amazing... or so I thought. Once I downloaded this app I got a virus on my phone!! It was so bad that all my social media got hacked and my phone started sending automated Trump 2020 messages and emails to evreyone! I expected way more from Donald Jenius Trump I really did...

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: The app itself is such a letdown I did not expect it to be this bad just bad vibes all around the energy is just bad definitely not a favorite of mine could do without completely other apps that are so much better, just a disappointment.

attributes.title: Fantastic 🇺🇸
attributes.review: What a great App for  the TRUMP ARMY to get everything in one Place😃News, Tweets,Campaign ads, Events, Merch and Step by Step guide on Digital Activism!! The Silent Majority is louder than ever KAG 2020
